failure.message:
Can't connect to WebDriver. Error: A new session could not be created. Details: Appium's IosDriver does not support Xcode version 10.0. Apple has deprecated UIAutomation. Use the "XCUITest" automationName capability instead.
Please make sure Selenium Server (ChromeDriver or PhantomJS) is running and accessible
failure.stack-trace: Error: A new session could not be created. Details: Appium's IosDriver does not support Xcode version 10.0. Apple has deprecated UIAutomation. Use the "XCUITest" automationName capability instead. at new RuntimeError (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/webdriverio/build/lib/utils/ErrorHandler.js:143:12) at Request._callback (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/webdriverio/build/lib/utils/RequestHandler.js:316:39) at Request.self.callback (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/webdriverio/node_modules/request/request.js:185:22) at emitTwo (events.js:126:13) at Request.emit (events.js:214:7) at Request.<anonymous> (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/webdriverio/node_modules/request/request.js:1161:10) at emitOne (events.js:116:13) at Request.emit (events.js:211:7) at IncomingMessage.<anonymous> (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/webdriverio/node_modules/request/request.js:1083:12) at Object.onceWrapper (events.js:313:30)
